ch.codebulb.lambdaomega

Class U.Choice<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.codebulb.lambdaomega.U.Choice<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the return type
    Enclosing class:
    U

    public static class U.Choice<T>
extends Object
    Represents a simple choice tree. This structure can be used as an alternative to an if / else if / else structure with optionally enforced choice.

    The constructor of this class is not visible; use the convenience U.Choose(boolean, Supplier) method to create a new instance of this class. It's best practice to statically import this function in client code.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  U.Choice.NoValidChoiceException
      Signals that none of the U.Choices provided resolved to true.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      U.Choice<T> Or(boolean predicate, Supplier<T> function)
      Adds an "or" joined option.
      T or(T defaultValue)
      Returns the result of the first "or" option which evaluates to true or the default value provided if there is no valid option.
      T orNull()
      Returns the result of the first "or" option which evaluates to true or null if there is no valid option.
      T orThrow()
      Returns the result of the first "or" option which evaluates to true or throws a U.Choice.NoValidChoiceException if there is no valid option.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
